about_the_game: Hostile Lands is a 2D top-down shooter where a crash landing is mistaken for an act of war. This demo features the first 3 environments, where players will encounter many types of enemies, several boss fights, and 70+ unique guns.

short_description: The Hostile Lands Demo is a 2D top-down shooter where a crash landing is mistaken for an act of war. Find Unique Weapons. Fight your way through 3 different top-down environments. Rescue surviving crew members. Upgrade your skills. The full game is coming soon.
